scores.walksubheading: Most errands can be accomplished on foot.
scores.transitsubheading: Transit is convenient for most trips.
scores.bikesubheading: Flat as a pancake, good bike lanes.

commute.neareststop: 593 Annette Street is a 14 minute walk from the 2 LINE 2 (BLOOR - DANFORTH) at the RUNNYMEDE STATION - EASTBOUND PLATFORM stop.
commute.nearbyparks: Beresford Park, Beresford Park and Malta Park.
